Happy Friday, Artists!🌞 

Here is a new spring job digest.

📍Location: Europe, UK, or remote.

Note: I am not hiring for these roles or affiliated with the studios mentioned. I’m sharing these
to help my
and support colleagues find the right job.

🎬Able&Baker is looking for:
- 3D Character Animators (all levels)
- Senior Grooming Artist (Houdini)
📍Gran Canaria, Spain, or remote
👉

🎮Dovetail Games is looking for:
- Character Artist
📍UK
👉

🎮GOALS is looking for:
- Principal Concept Artist
📍Stockholm or remote within Europe
👉

🎬Zachary Goldman is looking for:
- Freelance 2D FX and Clean Up Artists
📍 UK/EU timezone
👉?

🎮Magic Media is looking for:
- 3D Hardsurface Artist
- Motion Capture Cleanup Animator
- Senior 3D Character Artist
- Senior 3D Prop Assets Artist
- Senior 2D Concept Artist
- 3D Generalist Artist
📍Remote
👉

🎬One of Us is looking for:
-  Creature / Character Modeller
📍UK and France
👉?

🎮Legion Studios is looking for:
- Concept Artist / Designer
- Lead – Senior 3D Environment Artist
- Technical Artist (Unreal)
- Technical Animator
📍Remote
👉

🎮Cloud Imperium Games is looking for:
- Cinematic Animator
- Senior Cinematic Designer
- HR Assistant / Coordinator
📍Frankfurt, Germany
👉

🎬Maga Animation Studio is looking for:
- 3D Character Modeler
- Lighter and Compositor
- Rigger
- Real-time Engine Technical Director
- CG Pipeline Developer
- Cinematic Animator
- Character Animator
- 3D Background Modeler
- 3D Props Modeler
📍Monza (Italy) or remote
👉

🎮Prisoners Of Terebellum is looking for:
- Senior Concept & Illustration Artist
📍Remote
👉

🎬Important Looking Pirates is looking for:
- Lighting Supervisor
- VFX Producer
📍Stockholm, London, and Hamburg
👉

Feel free to share these opportunities with anyone who might be interested!
